children.name: SELECT 1 AS one FROM "users" WHERE "users"."email" = $1 LIMIT $2
SELECT 1 AS one FROM "accounts" WHERE LOWER("accounts"."username") = 'wen203' AND LOWER("accounts"."domain") IS NULL LIMIT $1
SELECT "user_ips".* FROM "user_ips" WHERE "user_ips"."user_id" = $1 ORDER BY "user_ips"."user_id" ASC LIMIT $2
SELECT 1 AS one FROM "oauth_access_tokens" WHERE "oauth_access_tokens"."token" = $1 LIMIT $2
SELECT 1 AS one FROM "oauth_access_tokens" WHERE "oauth_access_tokens"."token" = $1 AND "oauth_access_tokens"."id" != $2 LIMIT $3
